headline.main: Being Fat Is as American as, Well, Apple Pie; Weight-Loss Programs

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re your series "Fat in America" (front page, Nov. 22-24): we do not agree that there are "consistent findings by obesity researchers that most people actually have little control over their body weight."
docs.snippet: To the Editor:   Re your series "Fat in America" (front page, Nov. 22-24): we do not agree that there are "consistent findings by obesity researchers that most people actually have little control over their body weight."
